words.ex: Public interest began to wane after the initial excitement.
The report condemned the wanton destruction of resources.
Investors remained wary of the volatile market.
His wayward behavior complicated the negotiations.
She felt weary after weeks of constant travel.
The artist’s whimsical style charmed the audience.
They managed to whittle the list down to five candidates.
She wielded considerable influence within the organization.
The wily negotiator secured a surprisingly favorable deal.
He gave a wistful smile as he recalled the past.
The structure was built to withstand extreme weather.
The team’s woeful performance prompted major changes.
As he was wont to do, he arrived precisely on time.
Her worldly perspective enriched the discussion.
They feared the public’s wrath after the announcement.
He felt wretched after realizing his mistake.
He writhed in discomfort during the long interrogation.
She offered a wry comment that lightened the mood.
